info.brief_description: You are only a few inches tall, how will you survive being the plaything of a giant?
info.description:
When your nothing more then a little inch tall runt, how will you survive in a world full of people who would love to keep you as a pet?
Any gender Giant is allowed along with anything except Under 15.
Yes Anything
M/m
Crush
Vore/AV/CV/UB
Toilet
Water sports

You can choose to be..
Male Giants

Roy, a 17 year old Basketball Player.
Usually wears Basketball short with a light t-shirt and sneakers.
Typically Buff, Athletic and A bit forceful

Chris, 18 year old Goth
Usually wears Black Jeans a dark T-shirt and boots
Considerably Fit, Lazy and Laid back, Unusually quiet but has a softer side for those smaller then him.

Len, 18 year old Geek
Usually wears Buggy Shorts and a hoodie, Barefoot or Flip flops.
Slightly Taller, Relaxed, Has a dark side for those weaker then himself.

Other Your Own Choice of Character

Female Giantess

Lynda 19 Year old Soccer Player
Usually wears Shorts, low cut tops and heels
Average sized, Kind of stuck up and bratty
Has a C-cup

Ella 17 Year old Goth
Usually wears Tight Jeans or a Skirt, Dark Shirts and a Jacket and Boots
A little on the plush side, but not fat, Reclusive but finds odd things interesting
Has a B-Cup

Karen 20 Year old Geek
Usually wears loose fitting clothing like sweats or loose jeans, a T-shirt and barefoot
Plush sized but not overly fat Has more curves then the other girls but very laid back
Has a D-cup

Other Your Own Choice of Character

The Tiny Ones
Rachel 17 Year old Geek
Kimberly 18 Year old Athlete
Mark 19 Year old Geek
Cody 20 Year old Geek

Other Your Own Choice of Character

But absolutely no characters under the age of 15
